Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Lekythos
Description: Lekythos made from pink clay with a narrow neck 2,5 cm in height, a handle and a pinched lip which serves as a spout.  The lower extremity is rounded and surrounded by a 5mm-deep ring base. The vessel is covered by a paler colouring on the neck and half of the shoulder.
